title: NIGHTS LIKE THESE
lyrics:
Oh nights like these, I live for nights like these, yeah
Start me up a vodka tonic
Sippin' at the bar [?]
[?]
And the drinks don't cost me much

And that's never anybody there

[?] me just fine, yeah, yeah

I'm here with a guitar not tryna be a star

Stool in a small state singin' the pain away

Señorita get up and dance



Oh nights like these, I live for nights like these

When you ain't nobody but you and I'm just me, ay

Not the light, no [?] and glam, just good vibes and good [?]

Oh nights like these, I live for nights like these



[?]

Locación esta perfecta puedo [?]

Hoy deseo ser un mano y [?] cantar [?] sin nadio pinar

Con la morena del vestida colorado quisiera bailar

(Hey so le escucha)

Una noche sin Sir Romeo

Y me voy al baño del pueblo

Bailo, [?] me emborracho

Yo baila [?] bachata, que no conozco [?]

Seria algo tan especial



Noches así que me haces sentido

Son momentos que me incitan a vivir

[?] amor, nadie se extraña [?]

Por noches asi me [?] soy feliz



Just tryna have a good night

Where ain't nobody worried 'bout the spotlight

I'm nobody, you're nobody and it's alright, it's alright, it's alright, ay

Just tryna have a good night

Where ain't nobody worried 'bout the spotlight

I'm nobody, you're nobody and it's alright, it's alright, it's alright, oh woah, oh



Oh nights like these, I live for nights like these (I live for nights like these)

When you ain't nobody but you and I'm just me, ay

Not the light, no [?] and glam, just good vibes and good [?]

Oh nights like these, I live for nights like these (I live for nights like these)

Noches así que me haces sentido

Son momentos que me incitan a vivir

[?] amor, nadie se extraña [?]

Por noches asi me [?] soy feliz

Oh nights like these, I live for nights like these
